This limited-edition flask of LOEWE 001 Woman EDP has been created in collaboration between LOEWE Perfumes and Spanish porcelain brand, LLADRÓ. ​ The signature LOEWE block-shaped flask is crafted in translucent glass, topped by a handcrafted, porcelain white flower cap, hand-painted with a pale green calyx.​

description: LOEWE 7 EDT, the original fragrance, now in a colourful new bottle, forming part of LOEWE's Botanical Rainbow.

Mysterious and original, LOEWE 7 Elixir reinterprets and amplifies the original LOEWE 7 EDP with a higher, more resonant concentration of essential oils. The scent reveals intense notes of patchouli, red pepper berries and amber, underlined by the rich, raw and authentic aspects of the LOEWE Accord—a new note based on the complex, resinous scent of the Spanish Rockrose wildflower—LOEWE’s fragrant DNA.

canonical_title: LOEWE Un Paseo Por Madrid 'Casa de Campo'
description: Evocative and enchanting, LOEWE Un Paseo por Madrid Casa de Campo pays tribute to the Casa de Campo park, once a royal hunting estate, now a verdant oasis for all Madrilenians. Abundant with natural beauty, trees, water and wildlife, it is a beloved space for rest and relaxation. The fragrance features floral, woody and musky notes of artemisia and sandalwood, underlined by the resinous complexity of the LOEWE Accord.

Mysterious and exotic, LOEWE Un Paseo Por Madrid Debod is inspired by Madrid’s atmospheric Templo de Debod—an Ancient Egyptian temple rebuilt in the Cuartel de la Montaña park. The floral, ambery and woody fragrance features notes of rose, oud and saffron.

Evocative and compelling, LOEWE Un Paseo por Madrid Doré is inspired by archive screenings at Madrid’s iconic, modernist Doré cinema. The fragrance features floral, aromatic and woody notes of patchouli and vainilla.
main_accords: vanilla; amber; warm spicy; woody; rose; patchouli; sweet; balsamic; fresh spicy; powdery
base_notes: Patchouli; Tonka Bean; Woody Notes; Benzoin; Amber

canonical_title: LOEWE Un Paseo Por Madrid 'La Bella Cibeles'
description: Delicate and sparkling, LOEWE Un Paseo por Madrid La Bella Cibeles is inspired by the sculptural fountain at Madrid’s Plaza de Cibeles. The fragrance features notes of rose, iris, vanilla and musk.

Enigmatic and timeless, LOEWE Un Paseo por Madrid Mayrit is inspired by the restless spirit of Arabian Madrid—then-named ‘Mayrit’—in the 4th Century. The fragrance features notes of orange blossom, jasmine and amber.

Emotive and singular, LOEWE Un Paseo por Madrid Ópera is inspired by dramatic performances at Madrid’s Teatro Real opera house. The fragrance features powdery, woody notes of jasmine petals, sandalwood and vanilla.

Evocative and compelling, the name of LOEWE Un Paseo por Madrid Prado pays tribute to the Prado Museum—a destination for classical European art—and the Spanish word for ‘meadow’, evoking an escape into elysian nature. Echoing the emotive, elegiac landscape paintings that hang in the museum’s galleries, the scent is an harmonious composition featuring aromatic, woody and ambery notes of chamomile, clary sage, cassis and lychee.
Floral and harmonious, LOEWE Un Paseo por Madrid Rosaleda is inspired by the serenity of the landscaped rose gardens in Madrid’s El Retiro park. The fragrance features notes of rose and musk.

canonical_title: LOEWE Un Paseo Por Madrid 'San Miguel'
description: Eclectic and unique, LOEWE Un Paseo por Madrid San Miguel is inspired by the vibrant energy of Madrid’s San Miguel market. The fragrance features notes of bergamot, pear and patchouli.
